name: bonanza
description: Customizable autocomplete for really large collections

scripts.test: jshint src/*.js tests/**/*.js && jscs src/*.js tests/**/*.js && browserify tests/*.js | tape-run
scripts.build: npm run test && browserify bonanza.js -d -o dist/bonanza.js && uglify -s dist/bonanza.js -o dist/bonanza.min.js && cleancss dist/bonanza.css -o dist/bonanza.min.css && browserify demo/index.js -o demo/demo.js
scripts.preversion: npm run build && git commit --allow-empty -am 'pre-release commit'

author: Nicolas Escalante <nlante@gmail.com>
